name: The Inevitable Fireball
description:
Van Wizard's Vibes are adventures/vibes/aesthetics to throw into your Van Wizards experience!

If there's a Fireball in Act One, it has to go off in the Third Act.

Send your Van of Wizards on a journey to the desert town of Chestnut where the Mageocracy are on the hunt for a Magical Artifact!

Who has the Inevitable Fireball? When will it go off? Who's the talking horse?

Rate and Comment! Each purchase guarantees community copies!
